TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QuaternionAnimation extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionAnimationBase

summary.span: 在指定的 上使用线性内插对两个目标值之间的 属性值进行动画处理。

span.span: Animates the value of a property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动画在一段时间内更新属性的值。An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time. 动画效果可能是微妙的，例如， 向左或向右移动几个像素，如将对象扩大200到原来的大小，同时旋转对象并更改其颜色。An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color. 若要在中创建动画 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，请将动画与对象的属性值关联。To create an animation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you associate an animation with an object's property value. ## 目标值Target Values 类在两个目标值之间创建转换。The class creates a transition between two target values. 若要设置其目标值，请使用其 、 和 属性。To set its target values, use its , , and properties. 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties specified|产生的行为Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. 有关将多个动画应用于单个属性的信息，请参阅 [关键帧动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview)。For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview). ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 由于 该类继承自 ，因此 对象获取几个特殊功能，其中包括：它们可以声明为 [资源](/dotnet/desktop-wpf/fundamentals/xaml-resources-define)、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。Because the class inherits from , objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as [resources](/dotnet/desktop-wpf/fundamentals/xaml-resources-define), shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关对象提供的不同功能的详细信息 ，请参阅可 [冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许您指定定义要进行动画处理的模型的开始方向和结束方向的四元数。This constructor allows you to specify the quaternions that define the beginning and ending orientations of the model being animated.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the specified to another specified over the specified , with the specified behavior at the end of the timeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用此构造函数，您可以指定定义要进行动画处理的模型的开始方向和结束方向的四元数，以及动画的时间线在其活动期间之外但其父级处于活动或保持期内时的行为。This constructor allows you to specify the quaternions that define the beginning and ending orientations of the model being animated, as well as the behavior of the animation's timeline when it is outside of its active period but its parent is inside its active or hold period.

summary.span: 获取或设置动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

span.span: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.

value.span: 动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

span.span: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将值 "按" 的值指定为特定量而不是指定起始值或结束值，请使用属性。Use the property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value. 你还可以将 属性与属性结合使用 。You may also use the property with the property. 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties specified|产生的行为Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **注意** 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `By`= " "/><*object* `By`=""/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `By`= "{[X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/><*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*> <*对象*。`By`><*object*.`By`> \< /> \ ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由 确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `defaultOriginValue` 是组合链中的第一个，则此值将为快照值 (如果有可用) 或基属性值，则该值将是链中前一个动画返回的值，该值 不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`如果动画位于属性上动画的第一个组合层中，则为基值; 否则，该值为属性的上一组合动画的输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动画仅设置了其 、 或 属性之一，则设置此属性将不起作用。If the animation has only one of its , , or properties set, setting this property has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖项属性的出现异常，它来自的标识符字段来自 ，并由各种派生类共享。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果动画的属性 使其重复播放时，动画将其取值进行累积，则为 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，动画的输出值仅在动画的 属性使其重复其简单持续时间时才会累积。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它在重新启动时不会累积其值，因为它的父级重复，或者其时钟已从调用中重新启动 。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖项属性的出现异常，它来自的标识符字段来自 ，并由各种派生类共享。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

The ending value of the animation.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|导致的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **注意** 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `To`= " "/><*object* `To`=""/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `To`= "{[X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/><*object* `To`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*> <*对象*。`To`><*object*.`To`> \< /> \ ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否动画使用球状线性计算两个位置之间的最短圆弧。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the animation uses spherical linear interpolation to calculate the shortest arc between positions.
